title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Rural and Community Development
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Rural and Community Development 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited rural community development (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Rural and Community Development conferred on her by or 
under the enactments specified in the Schedule are delegated to Joe O’Brien, 
Minister of State at the Department of Rural and Community Development. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 9th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [409] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister rural community development conferred enactment specified schedule delegated joe brien minister state department rural community development notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 9th october 2020 409 3

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: Educational Endowments (Ireland) Act 1885 (48 & 49 Vict. c. 78)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Educational Endowments (Ireland) Act 1885 (48 & 49 Vict. c. 78) 

Charities Acts 1961 and 1973 

Street and House to House Collections Act 1962 (No. 13 of 1962) 

Dormant Accounts Acts 2001 to 2012 

Unclaimed Life Assurance Policies Act 2003 (No. 2 of 2003) 

Charities Act 2009 (No. 6 of 2009) (other than section 13 of that Act) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
